name: War Town
description:
War town is a singleplayer competitive fps, choose one of the available game modes and find out which one is the best. Aim and shoot, but keep in mind the objectives of each game mode.

Game Modes

Conquest - You must run to the objective and make sure you stay safe from your enemies

Catch the Flag - A mode that tests the skills in a group to defend your flags

Deathmatch Time - Fast-paced gameplay, you are born only to kill or be killed, the winner will walk away with more points until the time runs out

Solo Deathmatch - Test your strength as a team, to take everyone down and score as many points as you can

Disarm - On one side the robbers and on the other the police, who race against time to prevent the planted bomb from exploding, or try to defuse it

CityBattle - This destroyed city demands a heavy firefight in search of conquering the 5 territories

(New) Forest - A large map to explore competitiveness with multiple players at the same time
